entry.title: Re To be clear, all user actions will factor into a NN model for a tweet and the account tweeting, including positive actions. As user accounts develo...
entry.summary: Re To be clear, all user actions will factor into a NN model for a tweet and the account tweeting, including positive actions. As user accounts develop credibility, their actions will have greater weight, similar to how @CommunityNotes works.
